definition: Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
thus/so/like that/you/thou
shore/beach/coast/bank/to border on
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The city of Harbin is a big city.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱市是一個大城市結束。

sentences.english: Our company has taken the lead in establishing Harbin Zhongda Research Institute for profiles doors and windows among the same industry.
sentences.chinese: 在同行業中率先成立了哈爾濱市中大塑料門窗研究所。

sentences.english: But Tian has chosen one in Harbin, Heilongjiang.
sentences.chinese: 但田川卻選擇了黑龍江省哈爾濱市的一所大學。

sentences.english: Harbin is the capital city of China's Hellongiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱市是中國的黑龍江省的省會。

sentences.english: Chen Yongjun, 28 years old, is living in Nangang, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 28歲的陳勇軍是黑龍江省哈爾濱市南崗區人。

sentences.english: So HCB should develop the consumer credit service positively.
sentences.chinese: 因此，哈爾濱市商業銀行應該積極發展消費信貸業務。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the ascertaining methods and the study of the storm intensity formula of Harbin.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了哈爾濱市暴雨強度公式的推求及其研究。

sentences.english: No. 8 building of Wenjun housing estate in Harbin is of non-beam & non-column .
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱市文君小區8號樓爲套內無樑無柱小高層住宅。

definition: door knocker (in the shape of a ring)
